sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均可表示人的"能力，才能"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: ability, capacity, capability, genius, talent, competence, faculty, gift, aptitude
means: ability ：普通用词，指人先天的或学来的各种能力。
capacity ：侧重指人的潜在能力，通常不指体力，多指才智，尤指接受与领悟能力。
capability ：多用于人，指胜任某项具体工作的能力，也指本身具有、尚未发挥的潜在能力。常与of或for连用。
genius ：语气最强，指天赋的高度才能与智力。
talent ：着重指人某方面具有可发展和倍养的突出天赋才能，但语意比genius弱。
competence ：正式用词，侧重指令人满意的业务能力与水平，达到胜任某项工作等的要求。
gift ：着重个人的天赋的才能或在某方面的显著本领，常暗含不能用一般规律作解释的意味。
aptitude ：多指先天或后天习得的运用自如的能力，常暗示接受能力强，能迅速掌握一种学术训练或艺术技巧。

word_mean: 收容力，包容力，吸收力：能容纳、保留，包含或吸收的能力
容量，容积：表示能容纳或所包含的物质的测定值
电容：在电学中，物体能容电荷的性能
智能：包括接受、完成、忍受和了解等能力

sentence.Network_cn: 她的才智和气质和他一样出众。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French capacité, from Latin capacitas, from capax, capac- 'that can contain', from capere 'take or hold'

encyclopedia.content: 语法： capacity 函数：size_type capacity()作用： 返回当前vector在重新进行内存分配以前所能容纳的元素数量。

entry.def: Your capacity for something is your ability to do it, or the amount of it that you are able to do.

example.ex: Our capacity for giving care, love and attention is limited...
example.tran: 我们能够给予的关怀、关爱和关注是有限的。

example.ex: Her mental capacity and temperament are as remarkable as his.
example.tran: 她的才智和气质和他一样出众。

entry.tran: (工厂、企业、地区的)生产量,生产（或运输）能力
entry.def: The capacity of something such as a factory, industry, or region is the quantity of things that it can produce or deliver with the equipment or resources that are available.

example.ex: ...the amount of spare capacity in the economy...
example.tran: 经济中的剩余生产能力

example.ex: Bread factories are working at full capacity...

entry.def: The capacity of a piece of equipment is its size or power, often measured in particular units.

example.ex: ...an aircraft with a bomb-carrying capacity of 454 kg.
...a feature which gave the vehicles a much greater fuel capacity than other trucks.
example.tran: 使这些车辆的储油量远远超过其他卡车的一个特点

entry.def: The capacity of a container is its volume, or the amount of liquid it can hold, measured in units such as litres or gallons.

example.ex: ...the fuel tanks, which had a capacity of 140 litres...
Grease 6 ramekin dishes of 150 ml (5-6 fl oz) capacity.
example.tran: 将6个容量为150毫升(5至6液盎司)的烤盘涂上油。

entry.tran: (建筑、地方、车辆的)可容纳人数,载客量
entry.def: The capacity of a building, place, or vehicle is the number of people or things that it can hold. If a place is filled to capacity, it is as full as it can possibly be.

example.ex: Each stadium had a seating capacity of about 50,000...
example.tran: 每个体育场均可容纳5万人左右。

example.ex: Toronto hospital maternity wards were filled to capacity.
example.tran: 多伦多医院的产房都已住满了。

entry.tran: 座无虚席的;满场的;挤满的
entry.def: A capacity crowd or audience completely fills a theatre, sports stadium, or other place.

example.ex: A capacity crowd of 76,000 people was at Wembley football stadium for the event.
example.tran: 温布利球场座无虚席，76,000人前来观看这场比赛。

entry.def: If you do something in a particular capacity, you do it as part of a particular job or duty, or because you are representing a particular organization or person.

example.ex: Ms Halliwell visited the Philippines in her capacity as a Special Representative of Unicef...
example.tran: 哈利韦尔女士以联合国儿童基金会特别代表的身份访问了菲律宾。

example.ex: This article is written in a personal capacity...
example.tran: 本文是以个人名义所写。

means.word_mean: 2. the susceptibility of something to a particular treatment;

sentences.sentence: "the capability of a metal to be fused"

means.word_mean: 3. the amount that can be contained;

sentences.sentence: "the gas tank has a capacity of 12 gallons"
"the plant is working at 80 per cent capacity"
"he was employed in the capacity of director"
"he should be retained in his present capacity at a higher salary"

means.word_mean: 6. (computer science) the amount of information (in bytes) that can be stored on a disk drive;

sentences.sentence: "the capacity of a hard disk drive is usually expressed in megabytes"

means.word_mean: 7. an electrical phenomenon whereby an electric charge is stored
8. the power to learn or retain knowledge; in law, the ability to understand the facts and significance of your behavior

stems_affixes.word_buile: cap可取之处+able能……的→adj.有能力的, 能干的
capacity[[n.容量,才能]]→adj.宽阔的;容积大的
cap拿,抓,握住+acity表名词→拿住的能力→容量;才能
cap抓+ion表名词→抓住主要内容→标题

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"有……倾向;能力或特性等"

stems_affixes.word_buile: cap拿,抓+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→拿住的能力→容量;才能
auda大胆+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.大胆,鲁莽
loqu说话+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.多话,饶舌
mend缺点+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.虚假
rap夺+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.掠夺,贪婪
ten握住+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→tenacious的名词
ver真+acity有……倾向;能力或特性等→n.真实性,诚实

Sentence.sentence: Last year the American car industry had the capacity to make 17 million vehicles.
their production capacity has shrunk to less than half of the previous year
In future, companies may develop hybrid (混合的) models, listing excess capacity (whether vehicles, equipment or office.
In our times, human shrewdness has mastered the deep mysteries of the earth at a level far beyond the capacities of earlier peoples.

sentences.en: The theater has a seating capacity of 800.
sentences.cn: 这个剧场可容纳八百名观众。

sentences.en: Their reasoning capacity must be developed.
sentences.cn: 他们的推理能力必须加以培养。

sentences.en: She worked here in the capacity of nurse.

jushi.english: This is a building of very large capacity.
jushi.chinese: 这是栋容量极大的建筑物。

jushi.english: She worked here in the capacity of nurse.
